articles.title: DPRK Premier Sends Message of Sympathy to Chinese Premier
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Sends Message of Sympathy to Chinese Premier
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Tuesday sent a message of sympathy to Li Keqiang, premier of the State Council of China, as regards a recent terrorist act that claimed huge casualties in Kunming City of Yunnan Province, China.
					 The message expressed deep sympathy and consolation to the Chinese government and the bereaved families of the victims.
					
					 Reaffirming the consistent stand of the DPRK opposing all forms of terrorist acts and any support for them, the message hoped that the Chinese government would eradicate the tragic aftermath of the terrorist case as early as possible and ensure the socio-political stability of the country.

articles.title: WPK Central Committee Secretary Meets Delegation of European Politicians
articles.content:
WPK Central Committee Secretary Meets Delegation of European Politicians
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), had a friendly talk with the visiting delegation of politicians from various political parties of Europe headed by Chief Executive Officer of Inter Mediate Jonathan Powell, former Downing Street Chief of Staff to Prime Minister Tony Blair, on Tuesday.
					 Present there were Vice Department Director Pak Kun Gwang and other officials of the C.C., the WPK, Dr. Franz von Daeniken, board director of the Swiss Drossos Fund and former state secretary of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Switzerland, Wolfgang M. Nowak from the Social Democratic Party of Germany, spokesman of the executive board of the International Forum of Deutsche Bank and former director-general at the German Federal Chancellery, Par Nuder from the Social Democratic Party of Sweden, chairman of the board of the Third Swedish National Pension Fund and former minister for finance of Sweden, Edmond Alphandery from the Union of People's Movement of France, president of French CNP International Insurance Company and former minister of economy of France, and other members of the delegation.

articles.title: Reception Given for Delegation of European Politicians
articles.content:
Reception Given for Delegation of European Politicians
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) hosted a reception for the visiting delegation of politicians from various political parties of Europe at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Tuesday.
					 Present at the reception on invitation were members of the delegation headed by Chief Executive Officer of Inter Mediate Jonathan Powell, former Downing Street Chief of Staff to Prime Minister Tony Blair.
					
					 Secretary Kim Yong Il, Vice Department Director Pak Kun Gwang and other officials of the Central Committee of the WPK were on hand.

articles.title: Agrarian Reform Law Marks 68th Anniversary
articles.content:
Agrarian Reform Law Marks 68th Anniversary
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- It has been 68 years since the promulgation of the historic Agrarian Reform Law in Korea.
					 At the time of Korea's liberation from Japan's colonial rule, peasants, the overwhelming majority of its population, were very poor as the most of arable land was owned by the Japanese imperialists, pro-Japanese elements and traitors to the nation.
					
					 The then situation in the country demanded correct settlement of the agrarian problem in order to free peasants from all kinds of exploitation and thus make them true masters of liberated Korea.
					
					 After acquainting himself in detail with the situation in rural areas and demand of landless peasants, President Kim Il Sung pushed forward the preparations for agrarian reform, including the confirmation of targets of land confiscation and methods of land confiscation and its distribution.
					
					 He also advanced a way to abolish the tenant system for good in the country, making deep study into every provision of the agrarian reform law.
					
					 On the basis of such preparations, he declared the enforcement of "Law on Agrarian Reform in North Korea" on March 5, Juche 35 (1946).
					
					 Under his leadership, the land reform was successfully carried out in the country, paving a wide avenue for the peasants to emerge masters of land and the country.

articles.title: Fishing for 2014 Begins in DPRK
articles.content:
Fishing for 2014 Begins in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Kamapho Fishing Station under the South Phyongan Provincial Fishery Management Bureau in the DPRK has begun fishing for this year.
					 Determined to carry through the tasks set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address, the officials and employees of the station made a great innovation in winter vessel repair. They finished repairing fishing vessels in a short period in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance, thus ensuring the first fishing for the year more than ten days earlier than usual.
					
					 Choe Kyong Ju, head of a fishing fleet at the station, told KCNA:
					
					 All the fishermen are filled with a strong will to carry out this year's fishing plan, three times that of last year, ahead of schedule, true to the intention of the Workers' Party of Korea for bettering the people's livelihood.
					
					 We will fish all the year round, without ever leaving the sea deserted, and always make good hauls by introducing the advanced detecting and fishing methods.
					
					 Meanwhile, tens of angle fishing net boats belonging to the Unjon Fishing Station under the North Phyongan Provincial Fishery Management Bureau already left for fishing grounds.

articles.title: DPRK's Acrobatics Successful at Int'l Festivals
articles.content:
DPRK's Acrobatics Successful at Int'l Festivals
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Acrobatics of the DPRK, physical acrobatics in particular, have drawn popularity at international circus festivals.
					 Recently, "A Horizontal Bar and Flying on Trapeze" won the top prize at the 3rd Figueras International Circus Festival in Spain.
					
					 Among the DPRK's physical acrobatics which won top prizes at international festivals are "Diverse Flight", "Balancing Etude" and "Swing and Seesaw".
					
					 "Diverse Flight" consists of various feats, distance-flight, quadruple flip-flap in the air and other movements of high technique. This work was highly appreciated at the 29th Monte Carlo International Acrobatic Festival and the 11th Wuqiao International Acrobatics Festival.
					
					 "Balancing Etude", combined with acrobatics and ballet, was performed at the 12th Wuqiao International Acrobatics Festival.
					
					 "Swing and Seesaw" won the prize at the Rome International Acrobatic Festival.

articles.title: News Analysis on Deeds of "Human Rights Judge"
articles.content:
News Analysis on Deeds of "Human Rights Judge"
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The United States is tundra of human rights, the world's worst human rights abuser.
					 This is well illustrated by its election system. Any election in the U.S. is a money competition among the rich disregarding the will of the overwhelming majority of the population.
					
					 During the 2012 presidential elections, Obama, the present chief executive, poured 23.6 million dollars on TV advertisement in less than one month to overpower his rivals.
					
					 It is quite clear that the will and interests of the working masses accounting for 99 percent of the population can be hardly respected under such money-based election system serving one percent rich persons. 
					
					 In the U.S. its citizens' freedom of speech, privacy of correspondence and other primary rights are violated by the state power.
					
					 The government has monitored every movement of all citizens in real time with cameras and wiretapping devices and even unmanned drones under the pretext of "national security".
					
					 More than ten millions of the population are jobless and the number of those in poverty increased to 46.5 millions last year from 39.8 millions in 2008.
					
					 The housing price soared 11.5 percent last year, leaving many people homeless.
					
					 Meanwhile, only 480 billionaires of the country have possessed 2.05 trillion dollars worth of wealth, leading a luxurious and dissipated life.  Last year President Obama spent at least one hundred million dollars on his one-week tour of African countries, evoking criticism from among the people.
					
					 Some days ago, the U.S. "GALLUP" released a polling result that two out of the three surveyed complained of the widened gap between the poor and the rich.
					
					 All sorts of crimes rampant in the U.S. pose a serious threat to the people's rights to existence and their inviolable rights.
					
					 New York City witnessed 1 093 cases of gun-related crimes last year.
					
					 More than one hundred thousands of people are affected by gunshots from gangs throughout the U.S. each year.
					
					 Though the U.S. administration is allegedly moving to establish the law on gun-related regulations, its attempt has suffered a setback due to obstructions of arms dealers. On the contrary, Illinois and other states have adopted bills on easing arms control.
					
					 Drug abuse that degrades people mentally and physically has become one of the social problems in the U.S.  Russia's ITAR-TASS reported that the amount of heroin consumption in the U.S. rose 80 percent in recent years.
					
					 Violent assaults on women are reported one after another in the U.S. Last year a 52-year-old man, Ariel Castro, abducted three women and confined them to his house, inflicting sexual assaults upon them for 10 years.
					
					 In the U.S., more than two million women fall victim to family assaults each year and nearly 20 percent of the women suffer from raping.
					
					 The police, whose mission is to prevent all sorts of social evils, take the lead in committing crimes.
					
					 In New York City, there was once a "cannibal policeman" who intended to roast 100 abducted women. 
					
					 The U.S. is getting more vocal about an "all-people-equal society" than any other country, but it is criticized by the international community as a kingdom of racial discrimination.
					
					 Last year, the Florida Court gave a verdict of not guilty to a white policeman, Zimmerman, who shot to death an innocent black boy, evoking an array of outcries among the black community.
					
					 As many as 1 000 ultra-right racist groups are active in the U.S., backed by the government.
					
					 Such poor human rights records can be witnessed in Japan and other Western countries following the U.S.
					
					 The anti-DPRK forces should reflect on their human rights issues and inhumane crimes before styling themselves "human rights judge".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Proud Tradition of Korean Revolution
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Proud Tradition of Korean Revolution
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The proud tradition of the Korean revolution which has won victory after victory by dint of ideology is the eternal lifeline for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, says Rodong Sinmun in an editorial article on Tuesday.
					 To put forward the information workers as the buglers of advance to educate and recruit people is the proud tradition of the ideological work of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) which was created in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolution and applied in the whole historical course of the developing revolution, the editorial article notes, and goes on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung gained precious experience and created model in information and agitation work in the period when he blazed the trial for the Korean revolution. This is the undying feats he performed by providing the basic cornerstone of the ideological work of the WPK.
					
					 The anti-Japanese guerrillas were determined to annihilate the enemy, hearing bugle calls ringing out in the van of the ranks as the orders, instructions and charge orders of Kim Il Sung, and the people turned out in the anti-Japanese war, hearing them as an appeal for an all-people resistance. The bugle calls of the Anti-Japanese Guerrilla Army led to the hurrah for the country's liberation and resounded endlessly on this land along with the dynamic advance for the building of a new country.
					
					 The tradition of information and agitation created during the anti-Japanese war threw its brighter rays in the annals of the revolution under the tested guidance of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He set forth the important slogan "Let Us Produce, Study and Live like the Anti-Japanese Guerrillas!" 40 years ago. This was an epochal event which brought about a fundamental turn in the ideological and mental traits of the information workers of the WPK.
					
					 The 1970s was brightly recorded in the history of the country as a great heyday in the era of the Workers' Party. This is the shining fruition of the leadership of Kim Jong Il who made sure that the bugle call of the Anti-Japanese Guerrilla Army rang out and the drumbeat of the revolution resounded across the country.
					
					 The bugle call of the Anti-Japanese Guerrilla Army is ringing out more loudly as an indestructible symbol of the powerful Paektusan nation and a marching song opening the way of the final victory in the new era of the Juche revolution steered by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces U.S. for Fanning Up Arms Race
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces U.S. for Fanning Up Arms Race
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, a European newspaper reported that the U.S. navy is mulling deploying laser weapons for the first time. It disclosed that the U.S. navy plans to install first laser gun on one of its warships at the end of this year and an electromagnetic gun within two years.
					 The U.S. frantic moves to enhance the killing power of war hardware are aimed to contain the other side and bring it to its knees by the incomparable military and technical edge in wars of aggression against other countries, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is paying lip service to "peace" and "disarmament" but it is nothing but a clumsy trick to cover up its true colors as the very one wrecking global peace and security and chief culprit of arms race.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' reckless moves to develop war hardware are an act against peace as they will fan up the worldwide arms race and military confrontation and make the international situation tense.
					
					 It is clear that many countries would not remain a passive onlooker to the U.S. ambitious moves to develop weapons of mass destruction.
					
					 If the U.S. continues arms buildup, the world will be drawn into a whirlpool of arms race and the international situation further complicated.
					
					 With no coaxing can the U.S. hide its true colors as the very one fanning up arms race and making the international situation tense and chief culprit hurting world peace and security.

articles.title: Minju Joson Discloses Real Intention of Japan Denying Crimes Related to Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Minju Joson Discloses Real Intention of Japan Denying Crimes Related to Sexual Slavery
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Japanese chief cabinet secretary in a recent news conference expressed his intention to re-examine the contents of the statement of former Chief Cabinet Secretary Yohei Kono which admitted the forced recruitment of women into sexual servitude for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 Prior to the news conference, the chief cabinet secretary told a lower house budget committee session that he "remained unchanged in the understanding" of the written answer of the government submitted by the first-term Abe Cabinet that there was no evidence that the Imperial Japanese Army was involved in the recruitment of women.
					
					 Minju Joson in a commentary says in this regard Tuesday:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are now working hard to deny the contents of the Kono statement in a bid to bury the crimes related to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army into oblivion of history.
					
					 Referring to their real intention, the commentary says:
					
					 They are afraid that the revival of militarism after which they aspire is called into question and rebuffed at home and abroad in case they admit such heinous unethical crimes as those related to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 What they seek is to create conditions favorable for converting Japan into a war state again by denying or whitewashing the past crimes as much as they can.
					
					 They are not caring about decency as human being in a bid to attain their criminal purpose for the revival of militarism and overseas expansion.
					
					 They would be well advised to bear in mind that their evading the settlement of the past crimes will drive Japan into an abyss of ruin.
					
					 They must behave themselves, properly understanding that no one will pardon Japan for still refusing to settle the past crimes.

articles.title: Key Resolve, Foal Eagle under Fire
articles.content:
Key Resolve, Foal Eagle under Fire
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists kicked off Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises, the large-scale war maneuvers for aggression, across south Korea on Feb. 24 despite the strong protest and denunciation at home and abroad.
					 The U.S. and its satellite forces are describing them as "defensive and annual" but their bellicose nature is being brought into bolder relief as they are based on scenarios for a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The warmongers are applying the "tailored deterrence strategy" and the "joint plan for coping with the provocation of a local war" to these military exercises pursuant to "OPLAN 5027".
					
					 The "tailored deterrence strategy" that was signed by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean military authorities in early October last year is a dangerous war scenario which stipulates that they shall preempt the DPRK by mobilizing all military means including nuclear weapons if the DPRK shows a bit of using nuclear weapons or missiles.
					
					 The "joint plan for coping with the provocation of a local war" the keynote of which is for the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces to interfere in a slight and accidental conflict between the north and the south and expand it into a total war fully reveals their real intention to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost.
					
					 Such dangerous plans for invading the DPRK are fully reflected in the joint military exercises.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are not concealing the plan for staging a large-scale live-ammunition drill under the simulated conditions for the operation to "occupy Pyongyang" within the shortest time during the exercises.
					
					 This time, the U.S. forces are orchestrating Key Resolve joint military exercises which had been done by the south Korean army from 2008 only in name only to lay bare their aggressive nature.
					
					 The Korean people and world peace-loving people are cautioning about the grave consequences to be entailed by the war exercises.

articles.title: S. Korean IS Slammed for Its Illegal Acts
articles.content:
S. Korean IS Slammed for Its Illegal Acts
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The representative of the Unified Progressive Party of south Korea slammed the Intelligence Service (IS) for its illegal acts on Monday, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People. 
					 She charged that the IS is leaving no means untried to brand people as "forces following the north" and incite hostility towards them.
					
					 The IS has employed such method to seize power, suppress the progressive forces and stay in power, and the case of attempted rebellion was fabricated for the same purpose, she held. 
					
					 She said she could not repress the resentment at the illegal regime's brazen-faced acts of indiscriminately attacking the legitimate political party and innocent citizens. 
					
					 She demanded the director of the IS resign and the present chief executive make an open apology.

articles.title: DPRK's Proposal for Peace Supported by French Lawmaker
articles.content:
DPRK's Proposal for Peace Supported by French Lawmaker
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Jean-Jacques Candelye, member of the National Assembly of France, sent a letter to Laurent Fabius, foreign minister of France, on February 25 demanding the French government pay special attention to the DPRK's proposal for peace.
					 Recalling that the stand of the DPRK for mending the north-south relations was clarified in the New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un and the crucial proposal of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK, the letter said: 
					
					 As regards the crucial proposal of the NDC of the DPRK, France should pay due attention to the DPRK's initiative for peace.
					
					 France should support the DPRK's proposals in the international arena including the UN Security Council. 
					
					 The letter demanded the government make positive efforts to ensure peace and disarmament on the Korean peninsula and stop the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills escalating tensions there, in particular.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by British Organizations
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on February 23 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Strengthen the Revolutionary Forces in Every Way so as to Achieve the Cause of Reunification of the Country".
					The statement said:
					
					A military fascist dictator was ruling south Korea in the 1960s.
					
					He ruthlessly suppressed the progressive forces desirous of national reunification and killed a lot of people.
					
					After making an accurate analysis of the prevailing situation, Kim Il Sung made a historic concluding speech titled "Let Us Strengthen the Revolutionary Forces in Every Way so as to Achieve the Cause of Reunification of the Country" at the 8th Plenary Meeting of the 4th Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					Underlining that in order to drive the U.S. imperialists out of the Korean peninsula and accomplish the national liberation revolution, it is necessary to prepare well the revolutionary forces in three aspects, he called for strengthening the revolutionary forces of the north and the south of Korea and the international revolutionary forces.
					
					His work encouraged the Korean people in their struggle for reunifying the country.
					
					We are convinced that the Korean people's just cause will surely win under the banner of the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Mongolia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Mongolia
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was published in booklet by a publishing house in Mongolia. 
					 The work, a speech made by Kim Jong Un at the military parade to celebrate the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), says the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the immutable truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks to be fulfilled to glorify the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 The book-releasing ceremony took place at Literary College of Mongolia on February 27. 
					
					 The rector of the college said at the ceremony that Kim Jong Un's work deals with important issues which will serve as guidelines for the development of the DPRK. The work makes people know better about his greatness, the rector added.

articles.title: Egyptian Organization Slams U.S. for Moves to Stifle DPRK
articles.content:
Egyptian Organization Slams U.S. for Moves to Stifle DPRK
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Egypt-Korea Friendship Association issued a statement on February 26 denouncing the U.S. for its moves to stifle the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The DPRK is a socialist country centered on the popular masses, a country where everything serves the people and a beacon of hope to which progressive mankind look up.
					
					 The U.S. is taking issue with the DPRK over its "human rights issue" because the latter is standing against the former's policy to dominate the Asia-Pacific region and the world.
					
					 The anti-DPRK "human rights" racket only shows that the U.S. policy for aggression against the DPRK went bankrupt.
					
					 The association calls upon the world people loving independence and justice to extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for defending socialism.
					
					 It urges the U.S. to halt all moves against the DPRK at once.

articles.title: DPRK's Sports Aces (7)
articles.content:
DPRK's Sports Aces (7)
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Pak Tu Ik, a winner of the title of People's Athlete, was one of the football aces of the DPRK.
					 He rose to fame as an Asian football star in the 8th World Cup held in Britain in July Juche 55 (1966) by scoring a goal against the Italian rival, thus making the DPRK team win qualification for quarterfinals.
					
					 In 2009, the AFC praised Pak as "grandfather" of the Asian football heroes, saying:
					
					 After the game between the DPRK and Italy ended with 1:0 in the 1966 World Cup, Pak has been kept in the memory of English football fans.
					
					 Pak's ball into the net of the Italian team led to the DPRK's advancement into the quarterfinals, the first of its kind for the Asian teams in the World Cup history.
					
					 In 2010, the U.S. Fox Sports recalled that the match was one of ten events in the history of World Cup with Pak Tu Ik's scoring at around 42nd minute of the first half beyond the expectations of all spectators.
					
					 Pak, called a pearl of the East, was born into a worker's family in Pyongyang in December 1936.
					
					 He liked to play football from his early years, and began his career from 1957. Two years later, he became a forward in the national team.
					
					 He took part in more than 130 international tournaments.
					
					 He was honored with the audience of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on several occasions. He made a contribution to the sports development of the country while serving as a football coach and official in the sports field for long time.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju envia mensaje de condolencias a su homologo chino
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju envia mensaje de condolencias a su homologo chino
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- El primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, envio el dia 4 un mensaje de condolencias al primer ministro del Consejo de Estado de la Republica Popular China, Li Keqiang, en relacion con que hubo grandes perdidas humanas por el terrorismo violento en la ciudad de Kunming de la provincia de Yunnan de China.
					En la misiva, el remitente expresa la mas profunda compasion y condolencias al gobierno chino y los familiares de las victimas.
					
					Reafirmando la invariable posicion de de la RPDC de oponerse al terrorismo de toda indole y al cualquier apoyo a este, desea que el gobierno chino liquide cuanto antes las consecuencias tragicas del presente incidente y asegure la estabilidad socio-politica del pais.

articles.title: ACNC comenta estado anti-DDHH de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ACNC comenta estado anti-DDHH de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- Estados Unidos es el maximo pais violador de DDHH en el mundo.
					Lo comprueba su regimen de elecciones.
					
					Alli las elecciones devienen una carrera monetaria que desprecia la opinion de las masas populares.
					
					En las elecciones presidenciales de 2012, el actual mandatario Obama gasto solo en un mes 23 millones 600 mil US$ para el anuncio de TV.
					
					Esta muy claro que en ese regimen, en que uno por ciento decide lo todo, no se estimen ni se materialicen la opinion ni el interes de las masas trabajadoras que ocupan 99%.
					
					En EE.UU. es violado oficialmente por el poder estatal hasta el derecho elemental de  ciudadanos tales como la libertad de prensa y el secreto de la correspondencia.
					
					Bajo el pretexto de "seguridad estatal", el gobierno controla directamente en tiempo real todos los movimientos de las personas con las camaras, los aparatos interceptores y hasta los drones.
					
					Mas de 10 millones de habitantes norteamericanos son desempleados y el numero de los pobres recogido en 2008 se incremento a 46 millones 500 mil en el ano pasado.
					
					El precio de la vivienda subio 11.5% mas en un ano ultimo, razon por la cual muchas personas vagabundean por las avenidas sin viviendas.
					
					Al contrario, 480 multimillonarios poseen los bienes enormes equivalentes a 2 billones 50 mil millones US$ y llevan una vida viciosa.
					
					En el ano pasado Obama gasto mas de cien millones de dolares durante su giro de una semana por los paises africanos, lo cual causo las criticas de las personas.
					
					Hace poco, la institucion encuestadora Gallup hizo publico el resultado de indagacion, segun lo cual dos personas de cada tres expresan un fuerte disgusto ante el hecho de que se aumenta mas la diferencia entre los ricos y los pobres.
					
					En el territorio norteamericano son amenazados gravemente la vida y el derecho inviolable de las personas debido a los crimenes de toda indole.
					
					En el ano pasado en la ciudad de Nueva York ocurrieron mas de un mil 93 casos de crimenes relacionados de fusiles.
					
					A escala nacional mas de cien mil personas reciben el disparo de los gangsteres cada ano.
					
					Aunque la administracion norteamericana planea trazar la ley para intensificar la restriccion de armas, esta labor no da buen resultado debido a los obstaculos de las empresas vendedoras de armas.
					
					Al contrario en varios estados como Illinois se adoptan libremente las leyes que alivian la restriccion de armas.
					
					Tambien constituye el rompecabezas de la sociedad el crimen de drogas que corrompe a los seres humanos en lo mental y fisico. 
					
					La agencia noticiera rusa ITAR-TASS reporto que en los ultimos anos en EE.UU. se aumento 80 por ciento mas la cantidad de consumo de heroinas. 
					
					Los actos violentos a las mujeres demuestran la corriente degenerada de la sociedad estadounidense. 
					
					El ano pasado un hombre de 52 anos llevo secuestradas a 3 mujeres a su casa y les cometio la violacion sexual durante 10 anos. 
					
					Cada ano, mas de 2 millones de mujeres se hacen victimas de la violacion familiar y 20 por ciento de las mujeres sufren la violacion sexual. 
					
					La policia comete al frente los crimenes de toda indole, en lugar de prevenir los males sociales. 
					
					En la ciudad de Nueva York fue detenido un "policia canibal" quien habia trazado la artimana de secuestrar a 100 mujeres para comerlas asadas. 
					
					EE.UU. preconiza mas que otros paises la "igualdad de todos los hombres", pero en la palestra internacional es criticado como reino de discriminacion racial. 
					
					El ano pasado, el Tribunal de Florida declaro inculpabilidad al policia blanco Zimmerman quien disparo a un nino negro inocente, provocando gran indignacion de la raza negra.
					
					Ya se aumenta a mas de mil el numero de las entidades racistas ultraderechistas amparadas por las autoridades. 
					
					Tales casos de violacion de DDHH se cometen en otros paises occidentales, Japon y otros paises satelites de EE.UU. 
					
					Las fuerzas hostiles anti-RPDC deben reflexionar primero sobre su situacion de DDHH y sus crimenes de lesa humanidad, antes de actuar como "juez de DDHH".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun califica a EE.UU. de autor de carrera armamentista
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun califica a EE.UU. de autor de carrera armamentista
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- Hace poco un periodico europeo informo que las fuerzas navales estadounidenses tratan de desplegar por primera vez las armas de laser para el combate real y planean ubicar a finales de este ano en el buque de guerra un canon de laser y dentro de dos anos proximos otro canon electromagnetico.
					El diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 4 subraya que el imperio norteamericano se enfrasca a elevar la efectividad de los equipos belicos con el fin de mantener a raya y arrodillar en la guerra a sus contrapartes con la absoluta e incomparable superioridad militar y tecnica, y prosigue:
					
					EE.UU. suele hablar de la "paz" y la "reduccion de armamentos", lo cual no pasa de ser una artimana orientada a encubrir su  naturaleza criminal de autor de la perturbacion de la paz y seguridad del mundo y de la carrera armamentista.
					
					Tales maniobras imprudentes de los imperialistas yanquis resultan una accion antipacifica que instiga la carrera armamentista y la confrontacion armada en el mundo y agrava la situacion internacional.
					
					Muchos paises del planeta no estaran con los brazos cruzados ante las ambiciosas maniobras del imperialismo yanqui para el desarrollo de armas de exterminio masivo.
					
					Si EE.UU. sigue aumentando las armas, el mundo se sumergira mas en el torbellino de la carrera armamentista y la situacion  internacional se vera mas complicada.
					
					Con cualesquier mentiras, EE.UU. no podra ocultar su naturaleza de promotor de la carrera naturaleza, la agravacion de la situacion internacional y la perturbacion de la paz y la seguridad del mundo.

articles.title: Minju Joson revela verdadera intencion de Japon
articles.content:
Minju Joson revela verdadera intencion de Japon
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- En una reciente conferencia de prensa, el director del secretariado del gabinete de Japon expuso la voluntad de revisar la declaracion de su antecedente Kono quien reconocio el caso de esclavitud sexual para el viejo ejercito japones. 
					Con anterioridad, en el comite presupuestario de la Camara de Representantes tambien el dijo que "no se ha cambiado la concepcion" en cuanto a la respuesta del gabinete de Abe del primer mandato que decia: "no hay testigo de arresto forzoso de mujeres por parte del viejo ejercito japones". 
					
					Recuerda el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual publicado este martes y continua: 
					
					En estos momentos los reaccionarios japoneses niegan la declaracion de Kono con el fin de dejar en secreto el crimen de esclavitud sexual para el viejo ejercito japones. 
					
					En el caso que ellos reconozcan sus crimenes de lesa humanidad incluso el caso de esclavitud sexual, se cuestionara la argumentacion del resurgimiento del militarismo deseado tanto por si mismos, lo que sera repudiado tanto en el interior como en el exterior. 
					
					En este contexto, intentan negar o embellecer lo mas posible sus crimenes del pasado y preparar el ambiente favorable a convertir el pais en el Estado de guerra del tiempo pasado. 
					
					Para lograr los designios criminales tales como el resurgimiento del militarismo y la expansion a ultramar, los reaccionarios japoneses botan sin vacilacion hasta la honra moral del ser humano. 
					
					Ellos deben actuar con prudencia al tener presente que nadie tolerara sus desesperados esfuerzos por eludir la liquidacion del pasado.
